awd_titl_txt: Earth Sciences Postdoctoral Research Fellowship Award
awd_abstract_narration: This project will: (a) Investigate the effects of weathering and                                                                                                hydrothermal circulation on Re-OS isotope systematics; (b) Test the                                                                                             potential for high-precision geochronology on young rocks using                 the Re-Os dating system; and (c) Investigate the degree of                      involvement of the continental crust during the formation of flood                                                                                              basalt.  Results from this investigation should bear significantly                                                                                              on the use of the Re-Os isotopic system as a chronometer and offer                                                                                              new information for the Os isotopic composition of the mantle and                                                                                               crust.
